titles: A prospectiue glasse to looke into heauen, or The cœlestiall Canaan described Together with the soules sacred soliloquie, and most ardent desire to be inuested into the same. Sung in a most heauenly hymne, to the great comfort of all good Christians, by the Muses most vnworthy, Iohn Vicars.
author: Vicars, John, 1579 or 80-1652.
publisher: Printed by W. Stansby for Iohn Smethwicke, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstanes Church-yard in Fleet-street,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
